Original: You land the [Skyship] next to the
structure formed of black stone
and step inside.
[Page]
This [Color:5]Hall of Darkness[Color:0] is similar to
the Echoing Library... Perhaps it was
built contemporaneously.
[Page]
The dark, shadowy halls instill dread
in you. This place has none of the
Echoing Library's sanctity.
[Page]
Worse yet, you cannot shake off the
feeling of being watched. You begin
your search, ill at ease...
Translation: You land the [Skyship] next to the
structure formed of black stone
and step inside.
[Page]
This [Color:5]Hall of Darkness[Color:0] is similar to
the Echoing Library... Perhaps it was
built contemporaneously.
[Page]
The dark, shadowy halls instill dread
in you. This place has none of the
Echoing Library's sanctity.
[Page]
Worse yet, you cannot shake off the
feeling of being watched. You begin
your search, ill at ease...

Original: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"What an unprecedented disaster! Will
it happen again? Finding out will be
a critical subject of research now.
[Page]
"At least we survived. Though were
we the only ones...?
[Page]
"Ever since the event, all means of
contact with the outside world have
been cut off.
[Page]
"Only a couple hundred of our people
have survived. Of all the shelters,
the one I was in happened to hold..."
[Page]
The account ends there.
Translation: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"What an unprecedented disaster! Will
it happen again? Finding out will be
a critical subject of research now.
[Page]
"At least we survived. Though were
we the only ones...?
[Page]
"Ever since the event, all means of
contact with the outside world have
been cut off.
[Page]
"Only a couple hundred of our people
have survived. Of all the shelters,
the one I was in happened to hold..."
[Page]
The account ends there.

Original: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"A few days after leaving the shelter,
we ran into problems. There's been
severe damage to the food generator.
[Page]
"Worse, the research team found that
the plants outside, and the animals
that feed on them, are poisonous.
[Page]
"We can neither sustain ourselves on
food from the generator, nor can we
farm, breed, or hunt our own food.
[Page]
"The world became a completely
different place while we were here
in the shelter..."
[Page]
The account ends there.
Translation: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"A few days after leaving the shelter,
we ran into problems. There's been
severe damage to the food generator.
[Page]
"Worse, the research team found that
the plants outside, and the animals
that feed on them, are poisonous.
[Page]
"We can neither sustain ourselves on
food from the generator, nor can we
farm, breed, or hunt our own food.
[Page]
"The world became a completely
different place while we were here
in the shelter..."
[Page]
The account ends there.

Original: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"The committee has finally decided to
put the plan in motion. I'm proud to
have the most crucial role in it.
[Page]
"We've been living on the few plants
that are safe to eat, but the food
shortages get worse by the day.
[Page]
"There were two survival plans put
forward. Either we adapt ourselves to
the environment, or adapt it to us.
[Page]
"After much debate, the committee
has gone for the latter option. We
call it the Yggdrasil Project..."
[Page]
The account ends there.
Translation: There is an extravagantly bound book
on the shelf at the dead end. You
pluck it from the shelf and read...
[Page]
"The committee has finally decided to
put the plan in motion. I'm proud to
have the most crucial role in it.
[Page]
"We've been living on the few plants
that are safe to eat, but the food
shortages get worse by the day.
[Page]
"There were two survival plans put
forward. Either we adapt ourselves to
the environment, or adapt it to us.
[Page]
"After much debate, the committee
has gone for the latter option. We
call it the Yggdrasil Project..."
[Page]
The account ends there.

Original: As you tread the quiet halls, you see
something like a large piece of cloth
on the ground ahead.
[Page]
You cautiously approach to get a
better sense of what it is...
[Page]
You realize with sudden shock that it
is a skeleton! The decayed corpse is
lying on the ground in a robe.
[Page]
Too much time has passed since the
poor soul's death to determine the
cause of death or even their sex.
[Page]
There is writing in black ink near
the corpse. Whoever it was had a
parting message to pass along...
[Page]
"INSECT
FAILURE
KEEP CLOSED"
[Page]
The words do not even form a sentence.
You grow anxious at what might lie
ahead as you resume your journey...
Translation: As you tread the quiet halls, you see
something like a large piece of cloth
on the ground ahead.
[Page]
You cautiously approach to get a
better sense of what it is...
[Page]
You realize with sudden shock that it
is a skeleton! The decayed corpse is
lying on the ground in a robe.
[Page]
Too much time has passed since the
poor soul's death to determine the
cause of death or even their sex.
[Page]
There is writing in black ink near
the corpse. Whoever it was had a
parting message to pass along...
[Page]
"INSECT
FAILURE
KEEP CLOSED"
[Page]
The words do not even form a sentence.
You grow anxious at what might lie
ahead as you resume your journey...

Original: As you walk through the maze, you are
surprised to come upon a wooden table
and chairs at a dead end.
[Page]
Even stranger, the table is set with
a bowl of piping hot soup and a basket
of soft, delicious-looking bread.
[Page]
Under any other circumstances, the
meal would be too inviting to pass
up, but here...
Translation: As you walk through the maze, you are
surprised to come upon a wooden table
and chairs at a dead end.
[Page]
Even stranger, the table is set with
a bowl of piping hot soup and a basket
of soft, delicious-looking bread.
[Page]
Under any other circumstances, the
meal would be too inviting to pass
up, but here...

Original: [Color:5]Eat the food?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Eat the food?[Color:0]

Original: The warm soup and bread turns out to
be as delicious as it looked. You
leave the table completely refreshed.
Translation: The warm soup and bread turns out to
be as delicious as it looked. You
leave the table completely refreshed.

Original: [Color:3]The party recovers 300 HP
and 200 TP.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]The party recovers 300 HP
and 200 TP.[Color:0]

Original: You choose to ignore the table and
the inexplicable meal spread out
on it.
Translation: You choose to ignore the table and
the inexplicable meal spread out
on it.

Original: As you cautiously make your way
through the maze, you reach a dead
end and cannot help but gasp.
[Page]
Dozens of stone statues have been
left here with pain and fear chiseled
on their faces.
[Page]
Were the ancient people models for
these...? They look as real as if
[Color:5]human flesh had been turned to stone[Color:0].
[Page]
You are tempted to inspect the vulgar
statues more closely, despite the
strong threat you sense here.
Translation: As you cautiously make your way
through the maze, you reach a dead
end and cannot help but gasp.
[Page]
Dozens of stone statues have been
left here with pain and fear chiseled
on their faces.
[Page]
Were the ancient people models for
these...? They look as real as if
[Color:5]human flesh had been turned to stone[Color:0].
[Page]
You are tempted to inspect the vulgar
statues more closely, despite the
strong threat you sense here.

Original: Dozens of stone statues stand here,
creating an eerie atmosphere...
[Page]
Were the ancient people models for
these...? They look as real as if
[Color:5]human flesh had been turned to stone[Color:0].
[Page]
You may inspect the statues more
closely, or heed your sense of danger
and leave at once.
Translation: Dozens of stone statues stand here,
creating an eerie atmosphere...
[Page]
Were the ancient people models for
these...? They look as real as if
[Color:5]human flesh had been turned to stone[Color:0].
[Page]
You may inspect the statues more
closely, or heed your sense of danger
and leave at once.

Original: [Color:5]Inspect the statues?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Inspect the statues?[Color:0]

Original: You approach one of the nearby statues
and reach out to touch it...
[Page]
Suddenly, monstrous flowers appear
from the shadows and ambush you with
lightning speed!
Translation: You approach one of the nearby statues
and reach out to touch it...
[Page]
Suddenly, monstrous flowers appear
from the shadows and ambush you with
lightning speed!

Original: Carelessness is often paid for with
one's life... Knowing this, you elect
to leave this place.
Translation: Carelessness is often paid for with
one's life... Knowing this, you elect
to leave this place.

Original: After a desperate struggle, you manage
to slay the monstrous flowers.
[Page]
It seems the "statues" were created by
the monsters you have just vanquished.
[Page]
Having narrowly escaped joining their
number, you continue your trek through
the maze with even greater caution...
Translation: After a desperate struggle, you manage
to slay the monstrous flowers.
[Page]
It seems the "statues" were created by
the monsters you have just vanquished.
[Page]
Having narrowly escaped joining their
number, you continue your trek through
the maze with even greater caution...
